Returns: This Builder object to allow for chaining of calls to builder methods.
Parameters: Bundle: Domain-specific extras associated with this TV input. Keys must be a scoped name, i.e. prefixed with a package name you own, so that different developers will not create conflicting keys.
setExtras(android.os.Bundle).Description: Sets domain-specific extras associated with this TV input.

Returns: This Builder object to allow for chaining of calls to builder methods.
Parameters: boolean: Whether this TV input can record TV programs.
setCanRecord(boolean).Description: Sets whether this TV input can record TV programs or not.

Returns: This Builder object to allow for chaining of calls to builder methods.
Parameters: int: The number of tuners this TV input has.
setTunerCount(int).Description: Sets the tuner count. Valid only for @B_android#media#tv#TvInputInfo#TYPE_TUNER_E@.

Returns: TvInputInfo containing information about this TV input.
build().Description: Creates a @B_android#media#tv#TvInputInfo_E@ instance with the specified fields. Most of the information is obtained by parsing the AndroidManifest and @B_android#media#tv#TvInputService#SERVICE_META_DATA_E@ for the @B_android#media#tv#TvInputService_E@ this TV input implements.

Parameters: Context: A Context of the application package implementing this class.
ComponentName: The name of the application component to be used for the @B_android#media#tv#TvInputService_E@.

ClassDesc: A convenience builder for creating @B_android#media#tv#TvInputInfo_E@ objects.
